item.description:
Hi Incubators!

Don't mind me and my crazy meetup titles every week. We are back indoors this week at the democracy center so come on in out of the rain! We'll be going through more improv games just to relax, laugh, and improve our improv! Bring smiles, friends, and a silly face, oh and halloween costume ideas too!

Remember no previous acting or improv experience required!

Make this your first one ever, you first one in awhile, or heck your first one since last week!

Any questions or concerns shoot me an email.

Cheers

Jason

p.s. also check out http://improvencyclop... and pick out a game and we'll work it into the evening!
item.name: This week's Cambridge Improv Incuator: SeeSaw Improv in 3Ding
